mapper.select: SELECT i.id, i.nombre, i.descripcion, i.fechalanzamiento, i.tarifaxdia, i.formatorenta, i.genero, ti.id as ti_id, ti.descripcion as ti_descripcion FROM VI_ITEMS as i left join VI_TIPOITEM as ti on i.TIPOITEM_id = ti.id

SELECT i.id, i.nombre, i.descripcion, i.fechalanzamiento, i.tarifaxdia, i.formatorenta, i.genero, ti.id as ti_id, ti.descripcion as ti_descripcion
FROM VI_ITEMS as i left join VI_TIPOITEM as ti on i.TIPOITEM_id = ti.id where i.id = #{itid}

SELECT r.id as r_id, r.nombre as r_nombre, r.descripcion as r_descripcion, r.fechalanzamiento as r_fechalanzamiento, r.tarifaxdia as r_tarifaxdia, r.formatorenta as r_formatorenta, r.genero as r_genero, ti.id as ti_id as ti_id, ti.descripcion as ti_descripcion
FROM VI_ITEMS AS r left join VI_TIPOITEM AS ti ON r.TIPOITEM_id=ti.id left join VI_ITEMRENTADO AS b ON r.id=b.ITEMS_id WHERE b.ITEMS_id IS null
